pages.text: Converts [Pigment](book://general/pigment) into pure [Ink](book://magic/ink), which you can supply to your magical items.\Used to fill Ink Containers, like [Ink Flasks](book://magic/ink_flask).\Unfortunately - [you remember how Ink is transferred](book://magic/ink@transfer) - there is always residue left behind. You can't use the full amount, though the transfer is quicker, the bigger the difference.
